reviews.subject: Calculus
reviews.review: Dr. Stone explains concepts clearly, but her exams are tough. Study hard!

reviews.subject: History of Art
reviews.review: An amazing professor with a deep passion for art history. His lectures are engaging!

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Lectures are informative, but she tends to speak very quickly.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've ever had. His insights into literature are profound.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Difficult to follow in lectures, but her office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Great professor, but the assignments are very challenging. Be prepared to code a lot.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but grading is a bit harsh. Participate in discussions to get better grades.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Concepts are explained well, but the labs are disorganized.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is incredible. She really cares about her students and the subject matter.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Lectures can be dry, and it's easy to fall behind if you're not paying attention.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: A very knowledgeable professor, but her exams are quite difficult.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: His classes make you think deeply. Highly recommend if you enjoy philosophical discussions.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Lectures are a bit dry, but the content is solid. Study the examples closely.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and field trips, but sometimes the workload feels overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Dr. King is passionate about music and it shows. His classes are a joy.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and approachable. Her lectures are always interesting.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Solid teaching but sometimes goes too fast. Take good notes.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Incredibly engaging and enthusiastic. Makes learning about geography exciting.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Good content, but the lectures can be a bit monotonous.

reviews.subject: Drama
reviews.review: Her passion for drama is infectious. You'll love every moment in her class.
